verbose_text: Having observed changes at both mRNA and protein levels and given the known role of eIF6 in translation initiation, we tested whether Eif6 haploinsufficiency leads to preferential translation of a subset of mRNAs in mouse gastrocnemius muscle using polysomal microarray analysis (XREF_FIG E and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: Eif6 haploinsufficiency leads to preferential translation
